title: IOS-XR CLI automation - Bash
slug: In this lab, we look at IOS-XR's Zero-Touch Provisioning (ZTP) Bash hooks for IOS-XR CLI, enabling you to deterministically handle IOS-XR CLI automation across show commands, config-apply, config-replace and more using on-box bash scripts or remote bash commands.

files.title: Introduction: Understanding ZTP and the ZTP bash helper library
Step 1: Playing with the onbox ZTP bash hooks
Step 2: Writing your first onbox IOS-XR CLI bash script
Step 3: Offbox IOS-XR CLI automation over SSH
Step 4: Extending offbox automation to Config Management tools
